content:
Ord. No. 20160623-090, Pt. 4, effective July 4, 2016, repealed the former § 25-2-834, and enacted a new § 25-2-834 as set out herein.
The former § 25-2-834 pertained to public school facility waiver. See References to
Ordinances and Code Comparative Table for complete history.

Development of an independent school district educational facility site may be governed
by an agreement authorized by Section 212.902 of the Local Government Code. If the
City and an independent school district have executed an agreement, the terms of that
agreement supersede the requirements of this title and the criteria manuals to the
extent of conflict.

Source: Section 13-2-620; Ord. 990225-70; Ord. 031211-11.
